$comment: This schema is inherited from the item level schema, which defines the structure. This schema adds the values specific to the MUDL items.

itemProperties.description: These are values used by the viewer to display the item.

embeddable.description: Can this item be embedded in another website using the embeddable viewer or not.

useTranscriptions.description: Does this item contain transcription information

transcriptionType.description: If transcriptions are used, are they normalised, diplomatic or both (with different urls).

useTranslations.description: Does this item contain translation information

sourceData.description: Relative local path to the source metadata, e.g. 'tei/foo.xml'

thumbnailUrl.description: URL for the thumbnail image to use, if not specified the first page is used.

displayImageRights.description: A description of the rights for the display images of this item. Displayed on item web page.

downloadImageRights.description: A description of the rights for the download images in this item. Displayed on image download. If not specified download not allowed.

linkToImageReproductionRequestPage.description: This is a link to request reproduction rights to these images.

pageReference.description: An identifier for a specific page.

oneOf.description: The name of a key in the "pages" object.
The 0-based index of a page after sorting by their "order" key. Negative indexes are counted from the end (the last page is -1, second to last is -2, etc).
True is this coverage extends to the firstpage or lastpage. False is not valid.

value.description: The value for this property .e.g. 'Elementary Mathematics'

order.description: This is used to decide the order of display in the list of metadata. e.g. '1. Title.' is before '2. Classmark'.

metadataProperties.description: These are properties allowed for each metadata section.

classmark.description: The classmark or human-readable id for this item.

additionalProperties.description: Any additional metadata properties for display, e.g. provenances, material etc.

title: JSON package format
description: This contains the information to describe an item (book, manuscript, etc) in the digital library.

pages.description: Pages is a list of objects that represent each page in the item.

additionalProperties.description: The page object should be named after the page index e.g. 1

label.description: The label for this page, e.g. 2v

order.description: This is used to determine the order for display.

image.description: An object representing the image for this page.

href.description: The local path to the image for this page relative to the image storage location, e.g. images/mypicture.tiff

transcription.description: An object representing the transcription data for this page.

diplomatic.description: A path to the diplomatic transcription data in html for this page.

normalised.description: A path to the normalised transcription data in html for this page.

translation.description: An object representing the translation data for this page.

href.description: A path to the translation data in html for this page.
